# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-110">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-112">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-114">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-115">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-117">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-118">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-119">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-120">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 9 개의 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-146">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-148">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-150">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-151">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-152">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-154">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-155">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-160">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-173">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-175">6-10자리 숫자(은행 지점 번호 포함 또는 제외)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-177">계좌 번호는 6-10자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-178">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-179">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-180">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-181">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-183">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-186">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-188">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-190">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-198">holder address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-198">holder address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-199">bank address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-199">bank address</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-207">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-207">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-209">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-209">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-211">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-212">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-213">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-214">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-215">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-216">1-2개의 선택적 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-217">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-218">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-219">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-220">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-221">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-223">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-224">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-225">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-226">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-326">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-328">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-330">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-331">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-332">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-333">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-334">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-339">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-340">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-341">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-353">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-353">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-354">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-355">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-355">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-357">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-357">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-358">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-359">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-360">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-361">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-361">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-362">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-362">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-363">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-363">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-397">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-397">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-399">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-399">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-401">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백과 함께 표시되는 8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-401">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-402">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-402">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-403">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-403">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-404">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-404">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-405">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-405">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-406">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-406">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-407">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-408">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-408">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-409">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-411">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-411">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-412">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-412">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-413">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-413">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-456">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-456">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-457">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-457">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-458">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-458">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-459">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-459">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-460">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-460">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-461">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-461">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-462">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-463">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-464">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-465">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-466">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-466">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-467">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-467">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-484">오스트리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-484">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-485">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-486">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-487">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-487">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-489">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-489">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-490">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-490">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-491">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-491">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-492">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-493">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-493">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-494">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-495">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-496">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-496">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-497">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-497">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-501">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-503">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-503">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-504">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-504">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-505">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-506">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-506">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-508">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-508">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-509">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-509">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-510">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-510">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-511">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-511">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-512">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-513">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-513">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-516">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-516">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-517">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-517">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-518">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-518">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-519">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-519">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-520">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-520">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-521">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-521">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-522">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-522">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-525">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-525">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-526">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-527">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-528">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-528">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-530">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-530">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-531">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-531">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-532">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-532">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-533">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-533">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-534">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-535">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-535">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-536">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-537">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-537">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-538">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-538">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-539">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-539">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-541">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-541">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-557">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-557">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-558">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 ID 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-558">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-559">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-560">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-560">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-561">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-562">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-562">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-563">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-563">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-564">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-564">A hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-565">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-565">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-566">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-566">A forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-567">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-567">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-568">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-569">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-572">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-572">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-573">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-573">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-575">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-575">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-598">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-598">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-599">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-600">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-600">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-601">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-601">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-602">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-602">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-603">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-603">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-604">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-604">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-605">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-605">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-606">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-606">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-607">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-611">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-611">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-612">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-612">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-613">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-613">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-614">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-614">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-615">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-615">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-618">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-618">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-619">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-619">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-620">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-620">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-621">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-621">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-622">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-622">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-623">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-623">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-624">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-624">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-625">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-625">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-626">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-626">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-627">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-627">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-628">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-629">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-629">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-630">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-630">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-631">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-631">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-632">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-632">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-633">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-633">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-634">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-634">The string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-635">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-635">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-636">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-636">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-637">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-637">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-638">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-638">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-639">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-639">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-640">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-640">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-641">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-641">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-642">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-642">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-643">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-643">Any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-644">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-644">The string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-645">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-645">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-646">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-646">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-647">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-647">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-648">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-648">One or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-649">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-649">A semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-651">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-651">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-654">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-654">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-655">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-655">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-670">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-670">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-671">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-672">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-672">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-673">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-673">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-674">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-674">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-675">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-675">The string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-676">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-676">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-677">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-677">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-678">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-678">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-679">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-679">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-680">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-680">The string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-681">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-681">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-682">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-682">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-683">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-683">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-684">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-684">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-685">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-685">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-686">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-686">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-687">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-687">Any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-688">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-688">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-690">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-690">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-693">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-693">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-694">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-694">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-700">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-700">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-701">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-701">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-702">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-702">onebox</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-710">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-711">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-711">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-712">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-712">Pattern</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-736">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-736">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-737">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-738">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-738">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-739">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-739">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-740">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-745">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-745">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-746">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-746">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-747">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-747">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-748">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-748">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-749">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-749">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-750">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-751">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-751">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-754">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-754">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-755">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-755">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-756">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-756">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-757">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-757">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-763">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-763">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-764">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-764">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-770">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-770">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-771">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-772">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-772">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-773">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-773">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-774">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-774">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-775">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-775">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-776">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-776">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-777">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-777">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-778">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-778">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-779">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-779">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-780">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-780">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-781">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-782">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-782">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-783">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-784">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-784">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-785">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-785">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-786">Azure Service Bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-786">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-787">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-788">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-788">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-789">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-789">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-790">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-792">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-792">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-793">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-793">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-794">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-794">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-795">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-795">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-796">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-796">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-797">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-797">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-798">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-798">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-799">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-799">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-800">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-800">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-801">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-801">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-802">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-803">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-803">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-804">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-804">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-805">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-808">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-808">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-809">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-809">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-810">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-810">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-816">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-816">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-817">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-817">sandbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-820">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-820">127.0.0.1</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-825">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-825">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-826">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-827">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-827">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-828">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-829">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-829">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-830">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-830">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-831">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-831">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-832">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-832">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-833">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-833">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-834">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-834">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-835">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-835">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-836">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-836">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-837">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-837">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-838">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-838">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-839">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-840">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-841">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-842">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-843">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-843">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-844">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-845">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-845">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-846">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-846">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
