## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-864">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-864">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-865">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-866">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-866">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-868">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-868">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-869">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-869">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-870">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-870">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-871">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-872">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-872">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-873">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-874">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-875">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-875">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-876">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-876">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-877">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-877">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-878">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-879">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-879">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-880">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-881">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-881">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-883">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-886">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-886">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-887">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-887">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-889">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-889">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-893">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-893">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-909">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-909">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-910">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-910">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-911">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-912">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-912">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-914">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-914">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-915">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-915">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-916">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-916">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-917">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-917">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-918">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-918">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-919">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-919">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-920">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-923">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-923">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-924">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-924">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-925">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-925">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-926">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-933">identifiant 국가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-933">identifiant national</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-935">identificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-935">identificatie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-936">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-936">identification</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-985">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-985">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-986">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-986">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-987">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-988">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-988">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-989">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-990">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-990">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-991">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-992">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-992">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-993">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-994">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-994">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-995">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-995">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-996">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-996">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-997">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-997">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-999">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-999">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1000">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1000">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1001">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1001">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1002">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1002">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1003">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1003">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1004">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1004">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1005">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1005">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1006">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1006">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1007">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1007">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1008">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1009">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1009">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1010">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1011">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1011">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1012">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1013">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1013">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1014">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1015">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1015">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1016">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1016">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1017">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1017">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1019">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1039">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1039">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1040">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1040">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1041">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1041">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1042">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1042">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1043">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1043">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1044">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1044">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1045">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1045">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1046">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1046">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1047">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1047">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1048">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1048">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1049">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1049">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1050">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1051">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1051">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1052">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1053">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1054">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1054">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1055">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1055">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1114">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1114">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1115">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1116">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1116">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1117">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1118">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1118">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1119">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1119">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1120">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1120">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1121">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1121">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1122">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1122">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1123">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1123">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1124">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1124">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1125">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1125">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1126">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1126">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1127">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1127">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1128">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1129">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1129">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1130">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1131">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1131">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1132">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1132">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1133">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1133">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1134">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1136">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1136">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1137">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1149">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1149">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1151">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1151">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1152">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1153">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1153">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1154">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1154">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1155">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1155">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1156">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1156">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1157">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1157">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1158">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1158">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1159">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1159">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1160">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1160">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1161">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1161">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1162">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1162">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1163">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1164">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1166">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1167">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1167">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1168">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1168">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1170">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1170">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1171">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1171">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1172">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1194">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1194">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1195">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1196">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1196">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1199">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1199">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1200">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1200">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1201">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1201">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1202">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1202">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1203">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1203">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1204">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1204">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1205">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1205">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1206">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1206">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1208">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1208">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1209">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1209">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1210">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1210">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1211">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1214">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1215">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1215">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1216">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1219">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1219">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1222">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1222">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1225">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1225">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1226">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1226">número de rregistro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1230">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1230">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1231">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1231">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1232">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1232">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1234">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1234">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1236">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1236">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1238">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1238">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1241">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1241">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1242">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1242">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1248">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1248">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1253">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1253">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1254">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1254">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1255">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1255">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1258">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1258">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1261">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1261">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1262">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1263">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1264">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1264">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1266">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1266">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1267">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1267">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1268">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1268">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1269">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1269">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1270">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1270">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1271">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1272">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1272">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1273">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1274">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1275">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1275">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1276">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1276">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1278">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1323">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1323">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1324">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1324">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1325">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1325">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1326">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1326">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1327">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1327">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1328">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1328">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1329">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1330">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1330">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1331">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1332">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1332">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1333">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1333">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1334">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1334">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1335">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1335">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1336">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1336">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1337">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1337">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1338">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1338">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1339">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1339">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1340">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1340">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1341">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1341">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1342">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1342">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1343">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1344">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1344">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1346">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1346">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1347">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1348">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1348">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1349">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1350">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1350">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1351">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1351">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1352">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1352">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1353">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1353">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1354">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1399">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1399">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1400">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1401">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1401">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1402">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1403">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1403">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1404">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1404">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1405">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1405">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1406">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1406">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1407">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1407">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1408">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1408">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1409">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1409">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1411">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1414">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1414">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1415">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1415">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1416">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1416">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1417">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1417">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1418">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1418">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1419">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1419">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1443">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1443">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1445">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1445">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1447">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1447">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1448">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1449">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1449">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1450">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1451">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1452">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1452">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1453">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1453">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1454">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1454">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1455">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1455">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1456">Keyword_ [province_name] _drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1456">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1457">시/도 약어(예: AB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1457">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1458">시/도 이름(예: 앨버타)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1458">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1459">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1459">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1460">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1460">DL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1461">된다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1461">DLS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1462">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1462">CDL</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1590">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1590">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1591">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1592">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1592">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1594">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1594">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1595">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1596">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1596">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1599">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1599">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1600">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1600">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1612">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1612">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1613">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1614">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1614">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1615">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1616">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1616">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1617">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1618">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1619">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1620">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1621">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1621">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1622">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1622">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1652">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1652">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1653">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1654">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1654">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1656">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1656">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1657">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1658">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1659">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1660">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1661">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1661">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1694">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1694">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1696">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1696">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1698">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1698">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1699">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1699">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1700">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1700">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1701">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1701">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1702">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1702">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1703">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1703">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1704">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1704">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1706">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1706">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1709">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1709">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1710">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1710">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1711">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1711">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1712">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1712">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1713">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1713">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1714">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1715">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1715">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1716">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1716">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1717">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1717">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1718">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1718">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1743">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1743">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1745">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1745">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1747">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1747">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1748">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1748">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1749">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1749">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1750">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1750">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1751">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1751">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1752">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1752">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1753">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1753">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1754">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1754">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1755">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1756">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1756">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1758">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1759">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1759">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1760">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1760">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1761">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1761">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1763">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1763">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1764">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
