## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1779">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1779">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1781">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1781">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1783">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1783">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1784">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1784">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1785">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1785">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1786">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1786">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1787">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1787">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1788">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1789">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1791">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1792">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1792">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1793">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1793">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1794">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1794">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1796">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1796">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1797">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1810">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1810">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1811">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1811">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1812">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1812">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1813">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1813">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1814">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1814">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1816">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1816">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-1817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1819">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1819">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1820">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1820">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1821">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1821">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1822">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1822">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1823">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1823">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1824">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1824">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-1825">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1825">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1826">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1826">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-1827">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-1827">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2033">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2033">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2034">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2034">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2035">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2035">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2036">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2036">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2037">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2037">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2038">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2038">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2039">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2040">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2040">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2041">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2043">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2043">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2044">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2044">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2045">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2045">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2046">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2046">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2049">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2049">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2050">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2050">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2051">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2051">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2052">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2052">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2054">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2054">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2055">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2055">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2056">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2056">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2057">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2057">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2060">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2060">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2061">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2061">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2062">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2063">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2063">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2064">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2065">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2065">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2066">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2067">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2068">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2070">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2070">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2071">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2071">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2102">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2102">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2103">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2103">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2104">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2105">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2105">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2106">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2107">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2107">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2108">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2108">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2109">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2109">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2110">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2110">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2111">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2112">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2112">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2113">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2113">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2114">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2114">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2116">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2116">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2117">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2117">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2118">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2118">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2119">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2119">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2120">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2120">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2121">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2122">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2122">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2124">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2124">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2125">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2125">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2126">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2126">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2128">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2128">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2131">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2131">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2132">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2132">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2133">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2133">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2135">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2135">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2137">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2137">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2139">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2139">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2141">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2141">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2142">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2142">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2143">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2143">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2144">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2145">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2145">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2146">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2147">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2147">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2148">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2148">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2149">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2150">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2151">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2152">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2153">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2154">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2154">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2155">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2155">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2157">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2157">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2173">osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2173">osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2174">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2174">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2175">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2175">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2176">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2176">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2177">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2177">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2178">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2178">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2179">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2179">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2180">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2180">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2181">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2181">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2183">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2183">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2186">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2186">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2187">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2187">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2188">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2189">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2189">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2220">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2220">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2221">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2221">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2222">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2223">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2223">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2224">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2225">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2225">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2226">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2227">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2228">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2229">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2230">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2230">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2231">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2231">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2232">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2232">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2233">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2233">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2236">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2236">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2237">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2237">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2238">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2238">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2239">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2239">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2240">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2240">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2241">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2241">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2242">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2242">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2243">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2243">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2246">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2246">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2247">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2247">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2248">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2249">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2249">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2250">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2250">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2251">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2251">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2252">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2252">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2253">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2253">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2254">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2254">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2255">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2255">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2256">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2256">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2257">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2257">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2258">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2260">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2260">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2261">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2261">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2262">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2262">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2263">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2263">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2266">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2266">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2267">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2267">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2269">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2269">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2271">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2271">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2272">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2273">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2276">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2276">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2277">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2277">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2278">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2278">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2280">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2280">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2281">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2281">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2282">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2282">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2284">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2284">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2285">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2285">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2286">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2287">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2287">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2288">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2289">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2289">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2290">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2290">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2291">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2291">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2292">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2292">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2294">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2297">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2297">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2298">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2298">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2300">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2300">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2329">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2329">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2330">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2331">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2332">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2332">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2334">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2334">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2335">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2335">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2336">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2336">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2337">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2337">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2338">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2339">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2342">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2342">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2343">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2343">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2344">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2346">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2346">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2348">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2348">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2349">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2349">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2350">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2350">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2351">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2351">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2352">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2352">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2353">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2353">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2354">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2354">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2355">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2355">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2356">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2356">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2357">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2358">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2358">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2360">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2360">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2361">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2361">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2362">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2363">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2363">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2364">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2365">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2365">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2366">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2367">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2367">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2368">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2369">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2370">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2370">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2371">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2371">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2372">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2372">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2373">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2373">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2374">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2374">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2375">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2375">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2376">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2376">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2377">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2377">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2378">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2378">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2379">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2379">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2380">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2380">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2381">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2382">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2382">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2383">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2384">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2384">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2385">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2385">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2386">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2386">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2387">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2387">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2388">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2388">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2389">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2389">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2390">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2390">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2391">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2391">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2392">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2392">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2393">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2393">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2394">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2394">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2395">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2395">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2399">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2400">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2400">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2401">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2401">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2402">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2402">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2403">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2403">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2404">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2404">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2405">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2405">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2406">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2407">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2408">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2408">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2409">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2410">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2410">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2411">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2411">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2412">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2412">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2413">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2413">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2414">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2414">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2415">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2416">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2419">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2419">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2420">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2420">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2422">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2422">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2424">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2424">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2427">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2427">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2428">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2428">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2429">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2429">nationalnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2431">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2431">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2432">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2432">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2433">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2433">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2434">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2434">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2435">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2435">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2436">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2436">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2437">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2437">rodne cislo</span></span>

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2438">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2438">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2439">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2441">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2441">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2443">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2443">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2444">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2445">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2445">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2446">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2446">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2447">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2448">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2448">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2451">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2451">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2452">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2452">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2453">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2453">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2454">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2454">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2455">체코어 공화국 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2455">czech republic id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2456">czechidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2456">czechidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2457">daňové číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2457">daňové číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2458">identifikační číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2458">identifikační číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2459">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2459">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2460">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2460">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2491">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2491">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2492">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2492">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2493">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2494">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2494">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2495">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2496">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2496">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2497">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2498">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2498">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2499">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2501">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2501">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2502">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2502">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2503">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2503">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2504">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2504">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2505">| dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2505">|dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2507">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2507">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2508">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2508">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2509">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2509">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2510">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2510">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2513">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2513">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2514">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2514">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2515">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2515">driving license number</span></span>
