## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2519">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2519">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2520">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2520">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2521">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2522">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2522">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2523">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2523">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2524">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2524">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2525">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2526">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2526">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2527">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2528">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2529">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2529">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2530">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2530">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2531">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2533">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2533">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2534">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2534">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2535">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2535">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2536">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2536">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2537">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2537">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2538">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2538">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2539">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2540">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2541">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2541">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2542">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2543">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2543">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2544">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2544">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2545">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2545">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2546">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2546">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2547">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2548">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2548">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2549">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2550">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2551">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2551">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2552">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2553">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2553">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_denmark_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2554">Keyword_denmark_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2554">Keyword_denmark_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2555">centrale personregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2555">centrale personregister</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2563">건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2563">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2564">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2564">identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2566">identifikationsnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2566">identifikationsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2567">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2567">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2604">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2604">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2605">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2606">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2607">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2607">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2608">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2609">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2609">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2610">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2610">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2611">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2611">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2612">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2612">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2613">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2614">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2616">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2616">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2617">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2617">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2618">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2618">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2620">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2620">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2634">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2634">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2635">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2635">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2636">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2637">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2637">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2638">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2639">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2639">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2640">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2640">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2641">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2641">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2642">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2642">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2643">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2644">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2644">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2645">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2646">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2647">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2647">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2648">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2648">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2650">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2650">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2702">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2702">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2703">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2704">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2704">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2705">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2706">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2706">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2707">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2707">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2708">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2708">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2709">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2709">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2710">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2710">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2711">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2711">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2712">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2712">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2713">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2713">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2714">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2714">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2715">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2715">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2716">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2716">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2717">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2717">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2718">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2718">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2719">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2719">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2720">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2721">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2721">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2722">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2723">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2723">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2724">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2724">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2725">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2725">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2726">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2727">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2729">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2729">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2730">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2730">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2731">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2731">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2732">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2732">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2734">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2734">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2735">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2735">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2736">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2736">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2737">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2737">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2738">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2738">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2739">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2739">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2740">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2740">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2741">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2741">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2742">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2742">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2743">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2743">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2744">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2744">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2745">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2745">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2746">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2746">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2747">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2747">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2748">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2748">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2749">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2750">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2750">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2751">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2752">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2752">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2753">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2753">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2754">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2754">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2755">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2755">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2756">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2756">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2757">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2758">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2761">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2761">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2762">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2762">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2763">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2764">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2764">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2765">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2765">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2766">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2766">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2770">isikukood</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2770">isikukood</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2772">maksukohustuslase identifitseerimisnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2772">maksukohustuslase identifitseerimisnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2773">maksunumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2773">maksunumber</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2797">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2797">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2798">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2799">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2800">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2800">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2801">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2802">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2802">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2803">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2804">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2806">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2807">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2808">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2809">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2809">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2810">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2810">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2811">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2811">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2812">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2812">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2813">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2813">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2814">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2814">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2815">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2815">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2816">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2817">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2818">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2818">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2819">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2820">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2820">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2821">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2821">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2822">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2822">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2823">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2823">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2824">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2824">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2825">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2825">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2826">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2826">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2827">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2827">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2828">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2828">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2829">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2829">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2830">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2830">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2832">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2832">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2865">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2865">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2866">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2867">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2867">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2868">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2869">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2869">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2870">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2871">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-2872">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-2873">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2874">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2874">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2875">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2875">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2876">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2876">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2877">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2877">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2878">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2878">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2879">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2879">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2880">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2880">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-2881">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-2881">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3327">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3327">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3328">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3330">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3330">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3332">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3332">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3333">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3334">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3334">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3335">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3335">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3336">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3337">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3337">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3338">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3339">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3340">정규식이 해당 `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3340">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3341">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3341">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3342">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3342">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3344">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3344">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3345">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3345">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3346">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3346">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3347">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3347">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3348">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3348">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3349">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3349">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3350">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3350">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3351">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3351">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3352">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3352">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3353">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3353">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3354">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3354">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3355">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3355">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3356">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3356">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3357">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3357">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3358">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3358">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3359">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3360">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3360">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3361">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3362">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3362">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3363">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3363">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3364">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3364">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3365">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3365">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3366">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3366">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3367">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3368">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3368">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3369">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3370">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3370">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3371">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3371">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3372">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3372">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3373">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3373">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3374">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3374">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3375">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3375">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3376">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3376">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3422">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3422">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3423">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3423">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3424">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3424">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3425">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3425">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3426">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3427">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3427">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3428">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3428">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3429">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3429">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3430">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3430">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3431">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3431">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3432">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3432">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3433">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3433">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3434">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3434">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3436">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3436">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3437">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3437">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3438">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3438">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3439">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3441">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3441">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3443">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3443">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3444">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3445">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3445">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3446">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3446">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3447">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3447">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3448">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3448">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3449">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3449">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3450">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3450">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3452">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3452">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3455">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3455">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3456">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3456">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3458">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3458">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3482">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3482">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3483">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3485">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3485">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3487">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3487">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3488">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3488">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3489">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3489">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3490">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3490">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3491">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3491">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3492">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3493">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3493">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3494">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3495">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3495">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3496">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3496">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3497">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3497">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3498">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3499">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3499">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3550">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3550">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3551">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3551">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3552">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3553">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3553">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3555">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3555">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3556">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3557">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3557">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3558">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3559">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3559">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3560">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3560">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3561">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3561">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3562">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3562">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3563">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3563">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3568">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3568">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3575">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3575">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3576">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3576">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3577">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3578">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3578">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3580">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3582">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3584">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3585">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3585">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3586">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3586">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3587">card number

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3598">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3598">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3599">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3599">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3600">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3601">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3601">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3602">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3603">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3603">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3604">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3605">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3605">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3606">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3606">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3607">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3611">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3611">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3612">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3612">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3623">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3623">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3624">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3624">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3625">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3625">パスポート ＃</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3631">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3631">PasseportNon</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3633">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3633">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3634">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3634">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3635">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3636">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3636">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3637">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3638">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3638">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3639">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3639">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3640">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3640">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3641">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3641">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3642">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3643">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3643">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3644">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3645">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3645">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3646">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3646">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3647">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3647">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3648">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3648">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3650">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3650">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3651">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3651">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3652">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3652">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3678">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3678">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3679">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3679">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3680">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3681">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3681">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3682">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3683">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3683">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3684">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3684">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3685">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3685">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3686">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3686">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3687">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3688">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3688">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3689">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3691">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3691">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3692">From 키워드를 `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3692">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3694">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3694">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
