## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3714">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3714">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3715">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3715">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3716">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3717">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3717">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3719">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3719">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3720">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3720">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3721">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3721">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3722">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3722">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3723">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3723">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3724">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3724">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3725">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3726">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3728">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3729">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3729">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3730">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3731">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3731">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3732">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3732">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3733">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3733">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3734">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3734">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3827">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3827">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3828">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3828">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3829">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3829">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3830">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3830">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3831">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3831">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3832">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3832">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3834">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3834">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3835">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3835">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3836">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3836">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3837">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3837">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3838">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3838">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3839">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3840">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3840">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3842">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3842">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3843">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3843">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3844">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3844">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3849">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3849">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3850">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3850">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3851">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3851">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3852">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3852">identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3857">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3857">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3858">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3858">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3860">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3860">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3861">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3861">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3862">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3863">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3863">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3864">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3865">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3865">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3866">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3866">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3867">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3867">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3868">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3868">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3869">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3869">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3870">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3871">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3872">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3873">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3874">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3874">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3875">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3875">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3876">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3876">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3877">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3877">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3878">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3878">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3879">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3879">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3880">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3898">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3898">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3899">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3899">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3900">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3901">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3901">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3902">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3903">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3903">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3904">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3904">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3905">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3905">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3906">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3907">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3909">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3910">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3910">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3911">From 키워드를 `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3911">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3913">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3913">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3939">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3939">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3940">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3940">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3941">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3942">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3942">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3943">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3943">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3944">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3944">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3945">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3946">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3946">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3947">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3948">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3948">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3949">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3949">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3950">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3950">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3956">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3956">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3960">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3960">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3961">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3961">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3962">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3962">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3963">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3963">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3966">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3966">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3967">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3967">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3968">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3968">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3969">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3970">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3970">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3972">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3972">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3973">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3973">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3974">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3974">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3975">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3975">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3976">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3976">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3977">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3977">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3978">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3978">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3979">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3979">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3980">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3981">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3984">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3984">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3985">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3985">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3986">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3990">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3990">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3991">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3991">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3992">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3992">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3993">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3993">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3994">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3994">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-3995">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3995">ταυτότητας</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3996">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3996">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3997">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-3998">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-3999">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-3999">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4000">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4001">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4001">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4002">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4003">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4003">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4004">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4005">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4005">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4006">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4006">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4007">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4007">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4008">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4008">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4010">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4010">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4011">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4011">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4012">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4012">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4013">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4013">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4014">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4014">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4015">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4015">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4016">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4016">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4017">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4017">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4018">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4018">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4019">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4019">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4020">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4021">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4021">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4022">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4024">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4024">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4025">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4025">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4054">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4054">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4055">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4055">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4056">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4056">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4057">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4057">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4058">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4058">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4059">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4059">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4060">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4060">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4061">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4061">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4062">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4063">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4065">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4066">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4066">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4067">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4067">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4068">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4069">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4070">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4070">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4071">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4101">香港非永久性居民身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4101">香港非永久性居民身分證</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4110">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4110">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>
   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4111">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4111">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4112">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4112">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4113">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4114">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4114">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4115">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4116">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4116">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4117">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4117">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4118">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4118">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4119">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4120">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4121">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4122">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4123">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4123">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4124">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4124">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4125">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4125">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4126">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4126">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4127">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4127">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4128">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4128">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4129">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4129">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4130">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4130">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4131">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4131">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4132">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4132">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4133">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4133">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4134">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4134">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4135">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4135">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4136">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4136">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4137">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4137">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4138">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4138">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4139">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4139">vezetoi engedely</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4140">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4140">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4141">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4141">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4142">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4142">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4143">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4143">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4144">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4144">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4145">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4145">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4146">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4146">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4147">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4147">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4148">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4148">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4149">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4150">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4151">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4152">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4153">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4154">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4154">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4155">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4155">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4157">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4157">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4158">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4158">Keywords</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4161">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4162">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4162">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4163">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4163">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4164">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4164"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4165">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4165">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4167">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4167">személyi igazolvány</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4168">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4168">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4169">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4169">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4170">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4171">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4171">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4172">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4173">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4173">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4174">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4175">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4175">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4176">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4177">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4177">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4178">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4178">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4179">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4179">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4180">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4180">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4181">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4181">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4182">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4182">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4183">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4183">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4184">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4184">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4185">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4185">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4186">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4186">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4187">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4189">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4189">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4191">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4191">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4192">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4193">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4193">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4194">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4196">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4196">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4197">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4197">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4199">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4199">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4219">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4219">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4220">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4220">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4221">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4222">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4222">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4223">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4224">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4224">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4225">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4225">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4226">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4226">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4227">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4227">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4228">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4228">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4229">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4230">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4230">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4231">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4232">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4232">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4233">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4233">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4234">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4234">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4235">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4235">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4236">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4236">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4248">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4248">tax no#</span></span>
