## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4262">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4262">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4263">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4264">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4264">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4266">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4266">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4267">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4267">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4268">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4268">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4269">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4269">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4270">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4271">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4271">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4272">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4273">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4273">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4274">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4274">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4275">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4275">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4276">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4276">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4277">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4277">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4279">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4279">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4280">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4280">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4281">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4281">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4282">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4282">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4283">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4283">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4284">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4284">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4285">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4285">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4286">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4286">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4287">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4287">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4288">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4288">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4289">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4289">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4290">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4290">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4292">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4292">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4294">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4294">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4295">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4295">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4296">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4296">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4297">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4297">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4298">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4298">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4299">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4299">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4300">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4300">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4301">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4301">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4302">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4302">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4303">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4303">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4304">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4304">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4305">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4305">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4306">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4307">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4307">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4308">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4309">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4309">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4310">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4310">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4311">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4311">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4312">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4312">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4313">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4313">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4314">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4314">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4315">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4315">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4316">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4316">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4317">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4317">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4318">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4319">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4319">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4320">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4321">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4322">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4322">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4323">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4323">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4324">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4324">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4325">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4325">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4326">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4326">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4327">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4327">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4328">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4328">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4329">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4329">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4330">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4330">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4331">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4331">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4332">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4333">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4333">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4334">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4335">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4335">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4336">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4336">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4337">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4337">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4338">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4338">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4339">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4339">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4340">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4340">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4341">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4341">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4342">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4342">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4343">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4344">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4345">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4346">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4346">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4347">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4347">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4348">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4348">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4349">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4349">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4350">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4350">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4351">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4351">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4352">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4353">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4353">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4355">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4355">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4356">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4356">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4357">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4357">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4358">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4358">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4359">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4359">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4360">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4360">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4361">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4361">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4363">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4363">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4364">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4364">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4365">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4365">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4366">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4366">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4367">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4367">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4368">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4368">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4369">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4369">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4370">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4371">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4371">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4372">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4373">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4373">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4374">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4375">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4377">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4377">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4378">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4378">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4379">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4379">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4380">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4380">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4381">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4381">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4382">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4382">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4383">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4383">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4384">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4384">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4385">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4385">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4386">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4386">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4387">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4387">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4388">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4388">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4389">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4389">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4390">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4390">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4391">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4391">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4392">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4392">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4393">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4393">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4394">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4395">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4397">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4397">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4398">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4398">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4399">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4399">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4400">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4400">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4401">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4401">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4402">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4402">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4403">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4403">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4404">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4404">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4405">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4405">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4406">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4406">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4407">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4407">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4408">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4408">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4409">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4409">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4410">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4410">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4411">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4411">internet protocol</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4413">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4413">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4414">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4415">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4416">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4416">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4418">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4418">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4419">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4419">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4420">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4420">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4421">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4422">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4422">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4423">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4424">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4425">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4425">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4426">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4426">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4427">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4427">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4428">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4428">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4429">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4429">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4430">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4430">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4431">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4431">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4432">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4432">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4433">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4433">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4434">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4434">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4435">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4435">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4436">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4436">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4437">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4437">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4438">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4438">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4439">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4439">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4440">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4440">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4441">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4441">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4442">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4442">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4443">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4443">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4445">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4445">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4447">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4447">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4448">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4448">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4449">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4449">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4450">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4450">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4451">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4451">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4452">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4452">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4453">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4453">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4454">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4454">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4455">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4455">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4456">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4457">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4457">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4459">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4459">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4460">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4460">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4461">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4461">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4462">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4463">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4463">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4492">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4492">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4493">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4494">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4495">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4495">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4496">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4497">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4497">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4498">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4498">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4499">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4499">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4500">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4501">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4503">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4504">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4504">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4505">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4505">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4506">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4506">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4507">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4507">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4508">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4508">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4509">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4509">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4510">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4510">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4511">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4511">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4512">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4512">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4513">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4513">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4514">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4514">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4515">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4515">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4516">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4517">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4517">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4518">7자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4518">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4519">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4519">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4520">7자리 숫자와 2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4520">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4521">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4522">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4522">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4523">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4523">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4524">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4524">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4525">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4525">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4526">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4526">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4527">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4527">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4528">문자 "A" 또는 "H"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4528">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4529">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4530">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4532">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4533">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4533">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4534">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4534">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4535">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4535">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4536">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4536">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4537">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4538">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4538">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4539">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4539">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4541">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4541">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4542">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4542">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4543">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4543">Personal Public Service Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4544">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4544">PPS Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4545">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4545">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4546">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4546">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4547">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4547">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4548">.PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4548">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4549">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4549">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4550">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4550">Public Services Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4552">Uimh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4552">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4553">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4553">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4554">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4554">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4555">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4555">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4556">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4557">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4558">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4558">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4560">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4560">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4561">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4561">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4562">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4562">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4563">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4564">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4564">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4565">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4566">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4566">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4567">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4567">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4568">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4568">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4570">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4570">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4599">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4599">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4600">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4601">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4601">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4602">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4603">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4603">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4604">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4605">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4605">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4606">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4606">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4607">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4607">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4608">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4608">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4609">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4609">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4610">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4610">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4611">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4612">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4613">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4614">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4615">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4615">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4616">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4616">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4617">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4617">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4619">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4619">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4620">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4620">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4621">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4621">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4623">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4623">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4624">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4624">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4625">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4625">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4626">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4626">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4627">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4627">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4628">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4628">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4629">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4629">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4630">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4630">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4631">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4631">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4632">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4632">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4633">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4633">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4634">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4634">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4635">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4635">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4637">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4637">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4638">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4638">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4639">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4639">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4640">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4641">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4642">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4642">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4643">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4644">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4644">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4645">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4645">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4646">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4646">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4647">7개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4647">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4648">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4648">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4649">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4649">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4650">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4651">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4651">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4653">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4653">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4654">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4654">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4655">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4655">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4657">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4657">numero di patente di guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4659">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4659">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4660">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4660">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4662">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4662">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4664">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4664">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4665">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4665">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4666">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4666">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4667">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4667">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4668">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4668">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4669">Genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4669">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4670">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4670">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4671">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4671">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4672">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4673">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4673">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4674">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4676">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4676">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4677">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4677">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4678">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4678">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4679">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4679">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
