## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4714">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4714">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4715">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4715">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4716">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4717">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4717">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4719">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4719">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4720">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4720">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4721">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4721">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4722">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4723">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4723">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4726">정규식이 해당 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4726">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4727">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4727">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4728">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4728">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4730">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4730">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4732">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4732">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4733">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4733">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4734">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4734">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4736">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4736">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4737">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4737">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4738">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4738">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4739">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4739">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4740">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4742">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4742">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4744">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4744">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4745">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4745">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4746">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4746">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4747">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4747">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4748">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4748">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4749">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4749">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4750">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4750">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4751">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4751">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4752">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4753">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4754">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4755">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4755">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4756">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4756">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4757">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4757">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4759">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4759">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4794">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4794">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4795">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4796">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4796">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4797">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4798">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4798">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4799">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4799">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4800">은행 계좌 지점 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4800">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4801">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4801">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4802">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4802">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4803">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4803">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4804">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4808">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4808">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4809">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4810">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4810">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4811">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4812">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4814">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4814">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4815">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4815">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4874">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4874">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4875">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4876">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4876">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4878">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4878">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4879">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4880">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4881">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4882">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4882">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4883">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4883">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4884">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4884">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4912">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4912">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4913">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4914">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4914">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4915">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4916">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4916">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4917">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4920">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4921">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4921">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4922">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4922">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4929">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4929">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4930">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4931">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4931">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4933">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4933">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4934">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4934">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4935">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4935">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4936">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4936">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4937">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4938">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4939">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4940">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4940">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4941">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4941">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4942">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4942">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4943">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4943">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4945">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4945">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4946">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4946">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4947">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4947">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4948">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4948">在留カード番号</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4954">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4954">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4957">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4958">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4958">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4959">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4959">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4973">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4973">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4974">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4975">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4975">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4977">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4977">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4978">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4978">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4979">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4979">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4980">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4980">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4981">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4981">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4982">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4983">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4984">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4985">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4986">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4986">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4987">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4987">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4988">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4988">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4989">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4989">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4990">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4990">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4992">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4992">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4993">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4993">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4994">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4994">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4995">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4995">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-4997">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4997">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-4998">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4998">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-4999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-4999">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5001">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5001">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5003">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5003">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5004">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5004">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5005">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5005">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5007">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5007">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5010">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5010">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5011">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5011">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5013">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5013">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5017">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5017">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5021">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5021">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5023">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5023">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5024">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5024">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5027">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5027">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5028">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5028">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5029">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5030">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5030">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5031">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5032">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5032">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5033">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5033">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5034">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5034">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5035">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5035">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5036">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5036">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5037">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5038">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5038">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5039">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5040">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5041">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5041">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5042">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5042">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5043">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5043">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5044">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5044">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5053">전자 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5053">electronic number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5055">의료 기관 사용자 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5055">healthcare user number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5056">i #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5056">id#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5057">id-코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5057">id-code</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5107">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5107">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5108">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5108">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5109">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5110">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5110">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5112">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5112">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5113">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5113">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5114">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5114">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5115">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5119">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5119">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5120">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5120">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5121">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5121">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5123">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5123">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5124">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5124">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5125">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5125">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5126">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5126">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5127">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5127">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5128">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5128">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5129">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5129">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5130">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5130">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5131">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5131">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5132">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5132">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5133">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5133">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5134">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5134">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5135">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5135">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5136">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5137">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5137">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5139">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5140">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5140">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5141">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5141">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5143">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5143">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5206">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5206">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5207">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5207">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5209">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5209">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5210">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5211">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5211">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5212">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5213">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5213">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5214">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5216">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5216">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5217">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5217">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5222">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5222">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5223">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5223">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5229">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5229">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5230">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5230">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5233">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5233">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5234">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5234">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5236">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5236">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5238">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5238">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5239">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5239">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5240">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5240">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5241">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5241">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5242">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5242">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5243">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5244">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5244">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5247">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5247">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5248">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5248">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5250">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5250">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5285">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5285">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5286">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5286">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5287">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5288">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5288">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5289">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5290">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5290">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5292">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5292">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5295">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5295">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5296">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5296">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5297">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5299">여권 번호 lithunian 여권 번호 passport 암호 없음 o numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5299">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5300">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5300">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5301">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5301">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5302">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5303">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5303">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5305">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5305">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5306">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5307">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5307">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5308">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5309">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5310">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5310">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5311">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5311">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5313">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5313">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5347">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5347">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5348">중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5348">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5349">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5350">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5350">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5351">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5352">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5352">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5353">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5354">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5357">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5358">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5358">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5370">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5370">driver's licence number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5372">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5372">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5374">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5374">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5375">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5375">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5376">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5377">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5377">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5379">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5379">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5380">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5380">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5381">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5381">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5382">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5382">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5383">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5383">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5384">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5385">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5385">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5387">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5388">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5389">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5412">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5412">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5413">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5413">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5414">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5415">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5415">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5416">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5416">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5417">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5417">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5418">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5419">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5419">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5420">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5422">정규식이 해당 `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5422">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5423">From 키워드를 `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5423">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5424">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5424">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5426">여권 번호 라트비아어 여권 passport 번호 passport passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5426">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5427">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5427">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5428">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5428">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5429">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5429">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5430">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5430">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5431">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5431">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5432">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5432">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5433">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5433">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5434">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5434">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5435">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5436">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5436">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5438">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5438">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5439">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5439">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5440">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5440">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5441">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5442">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5442">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5482">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5482">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5483">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5484">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5484">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5486">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5486">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5487">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5487">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5488">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5488">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5489">2개 문자로 이루어진 출생지 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5489">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5490">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5490">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5491">임의의 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5491">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5492">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5492">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5493">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5494">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5495">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5496">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5496">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5497">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5497">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5498">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5498">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5513">kad pengenalan 말레이시아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5513">kad pengenalan malaysia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5514">kp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5514">kp</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5521">말레이시아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5521">malaysia identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5522">말레이지아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5522">malaysian identity card</span></span>
