## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5525">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5525">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5526">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5527">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5528">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5528">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5530">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5530">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5531">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5531">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5532">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5532">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5533">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5533">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5534">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5534">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5535">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5535">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5537">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5540">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5541">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5542">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5542">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5547">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5547">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5548">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5548">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5549">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5549">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5550">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5550">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5551">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5551">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5552">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5552">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5553">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5553">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5554">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5554">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5555">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5555">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5556">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5556">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5557">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5557">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5558">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5558">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5559">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5560">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5560">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5561">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5562">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5562">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5563">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5563">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5564">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5564">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5566">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5566">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5569">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5569">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5570">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5570">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5571">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5572">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5572">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5573">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5573">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5574">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5574">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5575">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5575">citizen service number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5589">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5589">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5590">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5591">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5592">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5592">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5593">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5594">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5594">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5595">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5596">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5599">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5600">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5601">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5601">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5603">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5603">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5604">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5604">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5605">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5605">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5606">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5606">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5607">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5607">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5608">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5608">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5609">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5610">몰타어 nationals의 경우 지정 된 패턴의 7 자리 및 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5610">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5611">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5611">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5613">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5613">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5614">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5614">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5615">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5615">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5616">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5616">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5617">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5617">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5618">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5619">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5619">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5620">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5622">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5622">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5623">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5623">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5624">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5625">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5625">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5658">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5658">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5659">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5660">선택적으로 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5660">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5662">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5662">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5663">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5663">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5664">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5664">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5665">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5665">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5666">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5666">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5667">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5667">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5669">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5672">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5672">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5673">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5673">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5674">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5674">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5675">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5675">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5699">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5699">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5700">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5700">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5701">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5702">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5702">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5703">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5704">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5704">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5706">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5706">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5709">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5709">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5710">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5710">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5720">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5720">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5728">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5728">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5729">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5730">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5731">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5731">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5733">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5733">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5734">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5735">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5737">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5738">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5738">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5739">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5739">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5740">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5740">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5741">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5741">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5765">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5765">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5766">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5766">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5767">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5767">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5768">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5768">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5769">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5769">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5770">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5770">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5771">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5772">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5772">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5773">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5774">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5775">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5775">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5776">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5776">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5777">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5777">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5778">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5778">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5783">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5783">paspoort</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5786">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5786">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5787">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5787">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5788">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5789">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5789">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5791">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5791">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5792">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5793">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5793">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5796">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5796">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5797">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5797">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5798">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5798">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5799">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5799">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5837">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5837">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5838">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5839">3개 문자, 공백 1개(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5839">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5840">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5841">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5841">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5843">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5843">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5845">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5846">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5846">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5847">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5847">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5848">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5848">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5849">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5849">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5851">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5851">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5852">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5852">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5853">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5853">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5854">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5854">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5855">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5855">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5856">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5856">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5857">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5857">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5858">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5858">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5859">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5859">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5860">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5860">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5861">3자리 개인 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5861">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5862">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5862">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5863">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5864">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5864">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5866">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5867">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5867">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5868">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5868">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5869">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5869">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5870">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5870">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5871">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5871">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5872">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5872">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5873">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5873">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5874">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5874">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5875">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5875">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5876">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5876">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5877">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5877">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5878">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5878">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5879">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5879">Personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5881">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5881">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5882">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5883">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5883">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5884">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5885">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5885">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5886">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5886">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5887">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5887">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5888">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5888">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5889">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5889">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5890">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5890">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5891">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5891">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5892">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5892">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5893">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5893">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5894">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5895">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5895">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5896">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5896">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5897">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5897">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5900">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5900">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5901">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5901">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5903">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5903">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5904">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5904">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5905">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5906">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5906">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5908">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5908">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5909">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5909">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5910">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5910">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5911">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5911">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5912">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5912">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5913">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5913">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5914">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5915">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5915">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5916">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5918">정규식이 해당 `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5918">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5919">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5919">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5920">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5920">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5924">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5924">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5925">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5925">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5926">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5926">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5927">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5927">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5928">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5928">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5929">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5929">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5930">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5930">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5931">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5931">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5932">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5932">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5933">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5933">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5934">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5934">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5935">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5935">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5936">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5937">3개의 문자 및 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5937">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5938">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5939">3개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5939">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5941">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5941">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5943">DLP 정책은 300 Func_polish_national_id 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5944">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5944">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5945">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5948">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5948">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5949">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5949">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5950">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5950">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5951">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5951">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5954">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5954">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5955">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5955">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5956">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5956">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5957">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5957">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5958">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5959">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5959">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5961">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5961">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5962">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5963">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5964">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5965">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5965">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5966">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5966">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5967">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5967">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5968">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5968">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5969">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5969">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5971">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5971">dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5974">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5974">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5975">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5975">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5976">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5976">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5977">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5977">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5978">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5978">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5979">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5979">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5980">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5980">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5981">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5983">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5983">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5985">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5985">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5987">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-5989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5989">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5990">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5990">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5991">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5991">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5992">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5993">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5993">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5995">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5995">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5996">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5996">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5997">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5997">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-5998">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5998">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-5999">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-5999">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6000">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6000">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6001">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6002">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6002">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6004">11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6004">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6005">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6006">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6006">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6008">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6009">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6009">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6010">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6010">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6012">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6012">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6042">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6042">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6043">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6044">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6044">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6045">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6046">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6046">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6048">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6048">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6049">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6049">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6050">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6050">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6051">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6051">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6052">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6052">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6053">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6053">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6054">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6054">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6055">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6055">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6060">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6060">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6061">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6061">documento de identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6062">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6062">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6063">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6063">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6064">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6064">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6065">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6065">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6066">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6066">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6067">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6067">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6068">nic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6068">nic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6069">número bi de 포르투갈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6069">número bi de portugal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6070">número de identificação 민사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6070">número de identificação civil</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6071">número de identificação 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6071">número de identificação fiscal</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6074">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6074">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6075">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6075">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6076">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6076">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6077">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6077">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6078">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6078">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6079">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6079">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6080">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6080">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6081">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6081">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6082">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6082">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6083">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6083">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6084">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6084">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6085">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6086">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6086">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6088">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6089">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6089">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6090">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6090">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6092">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6092">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
