## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6106">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6106">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6107">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6107">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6108">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6108">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6109">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6109">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6110">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6110">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6111">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6111">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6112">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6112">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6113">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6113">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6114">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6115">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6116">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6117">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6117">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6118">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6118">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6119">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6119">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6120">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6120">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6122">여권 번호 포르투갈어 passport 번호 passport número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6122">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6123">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6123">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6124">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6124">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6125">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6126">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6126">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6127">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6128">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6128">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6129">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6129">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6130">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6130">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6131">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6131">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6132">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6132">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6133">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6133">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6134">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6134">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6136">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6136">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6161">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6161">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6162">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6162">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6163">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6164">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6164">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6166">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6166">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6167">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6167">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6168">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6168">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6169">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6170">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6173">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6174">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6190">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6190">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6191">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6192">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6193">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6193">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6195">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6195">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6196">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6197">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6197">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6198">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6199">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6200">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6200">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6201">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6201">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6203">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6203">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6254">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6254">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6255">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6256">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6257">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6257">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6259">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6259">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6260">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6261">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6262">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6263">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6264">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6264">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6265">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6265">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6266">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6266">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6268">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6268">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6269">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6269">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6270">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6270">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6271">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6271">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6272">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6272">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6273">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6273">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6274">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6275">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6275">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6276">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6277">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6277">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6278">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6279">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6279">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6281">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6282">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6282">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6283">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6283">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6334">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6334">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6335">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6336">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6336">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6337">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6338">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6338">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6339">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6340">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6340">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6341">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6343">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6343">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6344">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6344">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6345">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6345">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6347">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6347">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6348">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6348">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6349">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6349">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6350">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6350">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6351">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6351">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6352">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6353">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6353">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6354">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6355">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6355">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6356">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6356">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6357">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6357">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6358">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6358">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6360">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6360">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6363">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6363">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6364">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6364">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6365">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6365">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6367">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6367">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6368">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6379">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6379">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6380">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6380">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6381">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6382">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6382">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6383">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6384">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6384">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6385">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6385">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6386">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6386">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6387">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6388">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6388">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6389">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6390">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6391">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6391">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6392">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6392">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6397">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6397">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6398">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6398">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6400">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6400">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6402">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6402">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6405">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6406">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6407">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6407">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6408">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6408">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6410">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6410">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6457">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6457">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6458">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6458">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6459">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6460">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6460">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6461">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6462">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6462">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6463">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6464">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6467">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6467">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6468">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6468">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6469">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6469">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6471">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6471">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6472">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6472">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6473">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6473">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6474">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6474">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6475">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6475">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6476">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6477">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6478">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6478">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6480">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6480">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6481">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6482">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6485">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6485">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6486">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6486">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6533">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6533">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6534">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6534">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6535">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6536">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6536">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6538">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6538">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6539">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6540">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6540">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6543">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6543">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6544">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6544">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6546">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6546">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6560">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6560">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6561">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6561">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6562">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6563">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6563">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6564">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6565">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6565">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6566">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6566">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6567">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6567">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6568">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6568">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6569">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6569">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6570">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6571">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6571">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6573">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6573">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6574">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6574">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6575">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6575">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6577">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6577">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6580">ed명령이 vena številka glavnega državljana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6580">edinstvena številka glavnega državljana</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6605">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6605">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6606">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6606">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6607">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6607">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6608">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6608">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6609">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6609">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6610">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6610">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6611">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6611">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6612">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6612">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6613">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6613">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6614">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6614">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6615">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6615">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6616">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6616">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6617">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6617">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6618">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6618">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6619">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6619">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6620">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6620">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6622">여권 번호 슬로베니아어 여권 번호 passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6622">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6623">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6623">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6624">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6624">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6625">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6626">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6626">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6628">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6628">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6629">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6630">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6630">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6631">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6632">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6632">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6633">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6633">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6634">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6634">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6635">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6635">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6636">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6636">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6660">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6660">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6662">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6662">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6664">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6664">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6665">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6665">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6666">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6666">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6667">1자리 시민권 표시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6667">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6668">숫자 "8" 또는 "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6668">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6669">체크섬 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6669">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6674">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6674">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6675">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6675">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6676">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6677">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6677">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6679">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6679">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6680">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6680">ID</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6682">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6682">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6684">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6684">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6686">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6686">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6687">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6687">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6688">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6688">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6689">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6689">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6690">4자리 출생 지역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6690">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6691">앞 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분하기 위해 사용되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6691">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6692">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6692">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6693">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6694">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6694">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6695">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6697">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6697">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6698">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6698">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6699">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6699">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6701">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6701">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6703">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6703">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6705">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6705">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6706">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6706">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6707">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6707">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6708">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6708">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6709">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6709">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6710">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6710">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6711">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6711">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6712">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6713">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6713">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6715">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6715">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6716">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6716">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6717">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6717">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6718">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6719">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6719">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6720">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6721">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6722">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6722">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6723">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6723">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6760">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6760">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6761">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6762">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6763">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6763">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6765">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6765">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6766">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6766">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6767">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6767">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6768">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6769">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6769">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6771">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6772">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6772">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6773">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6773">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6774">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6774">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6775">Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6775">Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
