- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6784">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6784">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6785">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6785">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6786">nationalid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6786">nationalid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6787">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6787">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6788">nie #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6788">nie#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6789">nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6789">nie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6790">nienúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6790">nienúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6791">número de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6791">número de identificación</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6792">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6792">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6793">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6793">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6794">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6794">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6795">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6795">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6796">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6796">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6797">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6797">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6798">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6799">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6800">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6800">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6801">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6802">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6802">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6803">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6803">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6804">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6804">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6805">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6805">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6806">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6807">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6807">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6809">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6810">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6810">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6811">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6811">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6812">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6812">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6813">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6813">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6814">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6814">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6815">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6815">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6816">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6816">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6817">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6817">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6818">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6818">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6819">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6819">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6820">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6820">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6821">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6821">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6822">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6822">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6823">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6823">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6824">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6824">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6825">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6826">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6826">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6828">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6828">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6829">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6829">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6830">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6830">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6831">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6831">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6832">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6832">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6833">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6833">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6834">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6835">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6835">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6836">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6837">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6837">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6838">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6838">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6839">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6840">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6840">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6841">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6841">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6842">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6842">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6843">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6843">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6844">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6845">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6845">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6847">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6847">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6848">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6848">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6849">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6849">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6850">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6850">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6851">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6851">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6852">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6852">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6853">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6853">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6854">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6854">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6855">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6855">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6856">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6856">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6857">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6857">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6858">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6858">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6859">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6859">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6860">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6860">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6861">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6861">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6862">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6862">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6863">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6863">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6864">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6864">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6865">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6865">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6867">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6870">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6870">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6871">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6871">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6873">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6873">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6874">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6875">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6875">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6876">cif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6876">cif</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6877">cifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6877">cifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6878">cifnúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6878">cifnúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6879">número de contribuyente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6879">número de contribuyente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6880">número de identificación 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6880">número de identificación fiscal</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6904">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6904">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6905">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6906">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6906">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6907">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6908">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6908">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6909">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6909">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6910">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6910">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6911">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6911">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6912">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6912">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6913">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6913">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6914">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6914">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6915">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6916">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6916">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6917">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6918">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6918">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6919">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6919">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6920">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6920">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6921">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6921">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6922">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6922">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6925">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6925">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6926">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6926">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6927">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6927">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6928">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6928">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6930">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6930">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6931">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6931">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6932">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6932">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6933">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6933">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6934">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6934">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6935">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6935">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6936">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6936">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6938">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6938">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6939">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6939">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6940">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6940">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6941">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6941">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6942">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6942">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6943">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6943">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6944">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6944">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6945">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6945">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6946">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6946">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6947">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6947">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6948">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6948">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6949">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6949">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6950">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6950">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6951">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6951">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6952">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6953">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6953">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6955">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6955">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6956">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6956">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6957">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6957">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6958">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6958">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6959">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6960">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6960">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6962">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6963">정규식이 해당 `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6963">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6964">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6964">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6965">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6966">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6966">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6967">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6967">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6968">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6968">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6969">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6969">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6970">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6970">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6971">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6971">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6972">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6972">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6973">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6973">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6974">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6974">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6975">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6975">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6976">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6976">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6977">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6977">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6978">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6978">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6979">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6979">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6980">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6980">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6981">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6983">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6983">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6985">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6985">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6986">2-4자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6986">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6987">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6987">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6988">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+"(선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6988">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6989">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6989">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6990">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6991">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6991">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6992">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6993">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6994">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6994">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-6995">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6996">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6996">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6997">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6997">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-6998">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6998">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-6999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-6999">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7001">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7001">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7003">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7003">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7008">Regex_sweden_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7008">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7009">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7009">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7010">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7010">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7011">Keyword_sweden_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7011">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7042">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7042">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7043">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7044">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7045">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7045">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7047">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7047">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7048">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7048">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7049">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7049">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7050">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7050">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7051">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7051">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7052">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7052">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7053">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7054">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7054">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7055">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7057">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7057">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7058">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7058">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7059">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7059">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7060">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7062">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7062">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7073">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7073">identifikationsnumret</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7075">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7075">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7076">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7076">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7077">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7078">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7079">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7079">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7080">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7081">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7081">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7082">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7082">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7083">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7083">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7084">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7084">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7085">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7085">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7086">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7086">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7087">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7087">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7088">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7089">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7089">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7090">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7091">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7091">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7092">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7092">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7093">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7093">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7094">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7094">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7095">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7095">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7121">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7121">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7122">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7123">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7123">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7124">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7125">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7125">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7126">4문자 은행 코드(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7126">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7127">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7127">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7128">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7128">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7129">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7129">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7130">1-3개 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7130">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7132">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7132">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7135">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7135">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7136">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7136">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7170">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7170">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7171">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7172">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7172">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7174">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7174">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7175">1개 문자(영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7175">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7176">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7176">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7177">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7177">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7178">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7179">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7179">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7180">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7182">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7182">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7183">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7183">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7184">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7184">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7185">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7186">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7186">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7187">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7204">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7204">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7205">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7205">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7206">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7206">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7207">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7207">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7208">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7209">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7209">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7210">숫자 "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7210">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7211">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7211">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7212">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7212">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7213">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7213">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7215">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7215">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7218">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7218">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7219">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7219">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7230">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7230">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7231">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7231">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7232">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7232">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7233">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7233">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7234">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7234">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7235">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7235">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7236">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7236">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7238">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7241">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7241">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7242">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7242">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7243">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7243">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7244">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7244">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7245">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7245">Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7248">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7248">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7249">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7249">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7250">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7250">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7251">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7251">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7252">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7252">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7253">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7253">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7254">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7254">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7255">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7255">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7256">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7256">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7257">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7258">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7258">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7260">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7260">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7261">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7261">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7262">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7262">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7263">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7264">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7264">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7265">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7266">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7266">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7267">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7267">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7268">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7268">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7269">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7270">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7270">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7271">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7271">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7273">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7273">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7274">Id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7274">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7279">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7279">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7280">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7280">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7281">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7281">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7282">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7282">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7283">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7283">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7284">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7284">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7285">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7285">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7286">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7286">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7287">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7287">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7288">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7288">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7289">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7289">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7290">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7290">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7291">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7291">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7292">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7292">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7294">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7294">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7295">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7295">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7296">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7296">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7297">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7297">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7298">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7298">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7299">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7299">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7300">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7300">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7301">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7302">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7302">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7303">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7304">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7304">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7305">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7305">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7306">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7306">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7307">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7307">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7308">2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7308">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7309">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7309">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7310">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7311">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7311">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7312">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7313">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7314">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7314">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7315">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7315">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7316">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7322">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7322">motor cars</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7323">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7323">125cc</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7324">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7324">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7325">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7325">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7326">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7326">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7327">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7327">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7328">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7328">learner drivers</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7329">licence holder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7329">licence holder</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7330">licence holders</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7330">licence holders</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7331">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7331">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7332">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7332">driving licence</span></span>
