## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7334">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7334">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7335">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7335">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7336">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7336">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7337">2개의 문자, 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7337">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7338">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7338">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7339">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7339">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7340">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7341">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7341">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7343">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7344">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7344">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7345">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7345">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7346">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7346">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7347">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7347">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7348">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7348">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7349">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7349">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7350">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7350">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7351">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7351">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7352">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7352">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7353">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7353">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7354">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7355">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7355">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7357">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7357">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7358">3 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7358">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7359">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7359">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7360">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7360">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7361">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7361">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7362">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7362">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7363">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7364">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7367">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7367">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7368">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7368">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7369">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7370">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7370">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7371">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7371">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7372">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7372">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7373">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7373">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7374">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7374">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7375">국립 보건 서비스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7375">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7376">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7376">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7377">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7377">health services authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7379">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7379">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7380">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7380">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7381">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7381">patient identification</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7390">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7390">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7391">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7391">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7392">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7392">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7393">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7394">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 자 또는 9 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7394">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7396">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7396">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7397">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7397">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7398">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7398">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7399">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7399">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7400">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7400">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7401">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7401">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7402">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7402">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7403">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7403">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7404">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7404">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7405">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7405">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7406">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7406">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7407">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7407">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7408">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7408">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7409">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7409">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7411">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7414">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7414">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7415">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7415">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7416">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7417">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7417">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7418">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7418">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7433">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7433">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7434">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7434">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7435">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7435">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7436">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7437">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 공백 및 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7437">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7438">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7439">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7439">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7440">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7441">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7441">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7442">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7443">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7444">이 함수는 해당 `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7444">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7445">From 키워드를 `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7445">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7465">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7465">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7466">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7466">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7467">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7467">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7468">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7468">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7469">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7469">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7470">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7471">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7472">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7473">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7474">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7474">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7475">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7475">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7476">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7476">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_usa_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7477">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7477">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7478">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7478">Checking Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7505">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7505">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7506">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7507">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7507">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7509">주마다 다릅니다(예: 뉴욕).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7509">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7510">Ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7510">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7511">Ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7511">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7512">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7513">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7513">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7516">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7516">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7517">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7517">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7518">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7518">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7519">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7519">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7520">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7520">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7521">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7521">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7522">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7522">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7523">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7523">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7621">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7621">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7622">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7623">"9"로 시작되고, "7" 또는 "8"을 4번째 숫자로 포함하고, 경우에 따라 공백이나 대시로 서식이 지정된 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7623">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7625">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7625">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7626">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7626">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7627">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7627">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7628">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7628">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7629">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7629">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7630">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7630">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7631">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7631">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7632">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7632">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7633">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7633">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7634">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7634">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7635">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7635">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7636">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7636">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7637">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7637">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7638">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7639">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7639">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7640">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7641">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7641">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7642">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7642">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7643">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7643">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7644">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7644">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7645">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7645">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7646">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7646">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7647">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7647">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7649">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7649">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7650">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7650">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7651">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7651">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7652">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7652">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7653">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7653">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7654">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7654">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7674">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7674">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7675">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7676">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7676">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7677">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7677">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7678">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7679">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7679">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7680">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7680">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7681">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7681">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7682">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7682">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7683">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7683">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7684">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7685">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7685">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7686">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7687">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7688">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7688">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7689">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7689">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7690">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7691">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7691">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7692">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7692">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7693">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7694">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7694">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7695">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7695">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7696">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7697">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7697">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7698">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7698">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7709">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7709">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7710">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7710">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7711">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7711">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7712">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7712">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7713">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7714">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7714">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7716">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7716">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7717">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7717">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7718">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7718">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fd097-7719">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7719">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fd097-7720">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7720">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7721">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7721">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fd097-7722">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fd097-7722">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
